name: A Time In Space VR Rollercoaster
name_original: A Time In Space VR Rollercoaster
description:
With this app you have two flying experience in the space for the price of one !

A Time In Space : this journey let you the opportunity to be in immersion in the space and live a sensational virtual reality experience

A Time In Space 2 : More longer and sensationner than the first part, "ATIS 2 Meet Ugo" is a 360 ° journey in the space were you can follow UGO the little robot in his secret mission ...

No controller needed !

If you have any trouble go on this website to explain your trouble :
http://vrstream.fr/index/topic/support-officiel-atis-ios/

This VR app is compatible with all VR Headset :
Cardboard
Homido
FreeFly
VR Box
Gear VR
ColorCross
...
